content: 3 fun style beanies for all ages worked in the round bottom up with instructions provided in written format sized from 1 year through to large male style options include garter stitch twisted rib & moss/seed stitch with notes on substituting other stitch patterns **i m unable to offer pattern support for my free patterns via ravelry pm or email - please visit the wormhead s hats group 1 if you have a question about this pattern thanks for your understanding ** **yarn** 100-147yd/91-134m/100g aran weight multi-plied yarn **needles & notions** set 4 5mm/uk7/us7 dpns/circular or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker as necessary tapestry needle **sample details** babylonglegs handspun 3ply 147yd/134m per 100g 100% wool **gauge** 18 sts x 24 row to 10cm/4 on 4 5mm needles over st st 17 sts x 32 row to 10cm/4 on 4 5mm needles over garter st 17 sts x 24 row to 10cm/4 on 4 5mm needles over twisted rib 17 sts x 23 row to 10cm/4 on 4 5mm needles over moss/seed st **sizes** to fit sizes 18 20 22 24 in/45 74 50 75 55 75 61 cm finished size 15 17 18 75 20 75 in/38 43 25 47 5 52 75 cm **skills required** knit & purl sts knitting in the round increases & decreases **accessibility statement** the main pdf for this pattern is colour blind accessible it uses black text on a white background and does not rely on colour published 2009 product code ww110ffathersonbeanies 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/woolly-wormheads-hats/topics/3891712
